stimulusHtml: A circular current-carrying loop lies so that the plane of the loop is perpendicular to a constant magnetic field of strength B. Suppose that the radius R of the loop could be made to increase with time t so that R = at, where a is a constant. What is the magnitude of the emf that would be generated around the loop as a function of t ?
choicesHtml: 2 π B a 2 t
2 π B a t
πB a 2  t
π 3 B a 2 t 3
